title: Making Butter from Corn
description:

Have a genius recipe you'd like to share? Tell me all about it! I'm at genius@food52.com.

itunes:title: Making Butter from Corn
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore, Whitney Wright
itunes:summary: With an abundance of fresh corn over the summer, there's no better time to revisit this genius technique to turn it into a sweet, flavorful butter
